faqs.title: What is brook code theme?
faqs.content: A modern and aesthetically pleasing theme designed for code editors like VSCode, Zed, and JetBrains. It enhances code readability and aesthetics while providing seamless support for syntax highlighting.

faqs.title: What editors are supported?
faqs.content: Currently, Brook Code Theme supports: Visual Studio Code (VSCode), Zed Editor, JetBrains IDEs (e.g., IntelliJ IDEA, WebStorm, PyCharm, etc.)It also supports code highlighting for markdown, blogs, or documentation tools.

faqs.title: Is this theme free?
faqs.content: Yes, Brook Code Theme is free to use. However, there may be premium features or variations in the future for enhanced customization.

faqs.title: How can i install the theme?
faqs.content: You can install the theme by following the instructions provided in the documentation.

faqs.title: Does the theme support customizations?
faqs.content: Yeah, you can customize the theme to your liking. Check the documentation for customization options.

faqs.title: What makes this theme unique?
faqs.content: The theme built with simple colors that combine black, white and gray to create a clean and professional look. It also includes a dark mode for those who prefer a darker interface.

faqs.title: Can i contribute to the project?
faqs.content: Yes, contributions are welcome! You can contribute by: Suggesting new features or improvements, Reporting bugs or inconsistencies, Submitting code updates or patches.

faqs.title: Are there plans for other editor support?
faqs.content: Yes, future plans include expanding Brook Code Theme support to other popular editors and IDEs such as Sublime Text, Atom, and Vim. Let us know which editor youâ€™d like to see supported next!

faqs.title: How can I report an issue or give feedback?
faqs.content: You can report issues or provide feedback by creating a new issue in the project's GitHub repository. We appreciate your input!
